title: 24-hour strike from tonight: RTUA
body_lines: 24-hour strike from tonight: RTUA A 24-hour trade union action will be launched at midnight today in solidarity with the people's struggle, the Railway Trade Union Alliance (RTUA) said.
They said the trade union action would start at midnight today and end at midnight tomorrow (28).
They also said the decision to engage in trade union action was made by the Trade Union Coordination Centre (TUCC) considering the current issues that have emerged due to the economic woes.
Therefore, the RTUA requested that the 27 trade unions that are currently active in the Railway department engage in the scheduled trade union action. (Chaturanga Samarawickrama)
